title: Courtyard Philadelphia Lansdale Celebrates One-Year Anniversary With Special Guest Package
text: Reprint LANSDALE, Pa. , July 30, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Celebrating the hotel's one-year anniversary, Courtyard Philadelphia Lansdale invites guests to join in on the fun with a special new deal. Travelers will enjoy a $50 credit at The Porch, breakfast for two at The Bistro - Eat. Drink. Connect. and a hospitable welcome gift to complement their stay throughout the anniversary celebration. This exciting offer is available now through the end of September, making it the perfect excuse for some last-minute summer fun. Giving guests a taste of one of Lansdale's newest restaurants, the $50 credit for The Porch allows travelers to treat themselves to locally produced American cuisine as well as beer, wine and cocktails, served daily from 4:30-10 p.m. Combining contemporary design with rustic accents, including a ceiling of beautifully restored planks from the region's old Crayola factory, the unique dining atmosphere awaits customers who are searching for a mouthwatering meal. Visitors can get started with tasty appetizers like the crispy Portobello fries or BBQ Hatfield pulled pork sliders before choosing from a savory selection of salads, sandwiches, flatbreads and main courses. After an entree such as grilled filet mignon or Yeungling battered fish & chips, guests with a sweet tooth can top off the night with options such as Freddy Hill Farms ice cream or an apple and walnut cobbler. After a hearty feast, guests are invited to relax in style with spacious accommodations , featuring modern decor and luxurious bedding including a thick mattress, plush duvets and comfortable pillows on which to rest after a long day. Hotel guests can also recharge and relax with complimentary wireless Internet access, conveniently placed outlets and 37-inch flat-panel TVs with premium cable channels. Large work desks and mini-refrigerators are also available in each room. For other travel needs during a stay at one of the newest hotels in Lansdale, PA , the staff is eager to accommodate business, leisure and event travelers coming into town with gracious hospitality and unmatched customer service. It will be easy to tell why we are ranked first on Trip Advisor by our guests. For a morning pick-me-up, complimentary breakfast for two is available at The Bistro - Eat. Drink. Connect ., which serves a wide selection of healthy breakfast items and specialty Starbucks beverages. Guests are able to start the day satisfied with thick-cut French toast and a fruit smoothie, or opt for one of the delectable morning scramblers. To take advantage of this special anniversary offer, book online using promotional code YX1 or contact 1-215-412-8686 for more information. 1 of 2
